ygData.subject: Singing Steel
ygData.msgSnippet: I am starting to see people sell it.  Someone was asking 5k for the boots.  Anyone else seeing prices? Hehe I have to think to myself: if I sold my fishbone
ygData.messageBody:
I am starting to see people sell it. Someone was asking 5k for the boots. Anyone
else seeing prices?

Hehe I have to think to myself: if I sold my fishbone earring and bought a pair of
Singing Steel gauntlets (not as good as getting them mind you, and I have been
hanging around Karnor lately ;P) then what other bauble could I also get? For me or
my baby cleric ;P.

Maravana Vireo
51 Bard of Jus Divinum, who bled plenty for each of the 4 pieces of imbrued she
wears
Mithaniel Marr
